new:
<COL 78f5ff>《High Orb Shop》 has been added!</COL>

By exchanging High Orbs, you can obtain crafting materials for creating powerful crests and unique-looking equipment.

old:

new:
You can exchange <COL 78f5ff>《<ITEM 24821>》</COL> at the High Orb Shop. Crafting recipes using it will be unlocked by obtaining various achievements.

<COL ffdc78>You can obtain achievements by clearing various contents such as Bitterblack Maze, War Missions, and Great Dragon Crystal Destruction Battle multiple times.</COL>

Let's conquer various contents to aim for equipment that has yet to be seen.
